subtitle: Make a batch of pancakes for the freezer - they can be used in many interesting ways.

method.text: To make pancake batter: Sift flour into bowl. Add salt, beaten egg and half the milk. Stir in flour gradually, keeping mixture free of lumps. Whisk in remaining milk.
Heat a very small quantity of oil in an omelette pan and use a little of the batter to make a thin pancake.

Mix together filling ingredients, reserving a little melted butter, and divide mixture between pancakes. Roll up pancakes to make neat parcels. Place parcels, seam-side underneath, in greased ovenproof dish and brush with remaining butter. Cover with foil and cook in the oven for 25 min.
Meanwhile, make tomato sauce. Heat oil in pan and cook onion and mushrooms for 3 min. Stir in water tomatoes, bay leaves and tomato pur?e. Bring to boil and simmer for 10 min.
Blend cornflour with 2 teaspoons of cold water, then stir into sauce. Bring to boil, stirring. Discard bay leaves.
Serve parcels with the tomato sauce. Garnish with sprigs of watercress.

title: Mushroom and ricotta parcels
